"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Manon reveals the power she's using while working with the Vanguard to <%me>. It is a power known as Overboost, given to her by Zephetto, only intended to be used in emergencies. However, there are no such restrictions on her now, so she is using it to speed up her investigations."
